Control Name: 1.23 Ensure Custom Role is assigned for Administering Resource Locks
Control Statement: Resource locking is a powerful protection mechanism that can prevent inadvertent modification/deletion of resources within Azure subscriptions/Resource Groups and is a recommended NIST configuration.
